name: 6/52 - The Rod Of God
description:
This Game was created for Ludum Dare 32 Compo!

The Rod of God is a physics-heavy simulation of how the worship of man has brought forth an avatar in his image, and now our sadly linear cities shall suffer his wrath so long as the faithful still follow him!

A and D to move left and right, space to drop the hammer or lift it again.

Special thanks to @Draknek, @fromsmiling, @bnhw, and @sally_anne_! Thanks so much for the help making this work, and jamming with me in Toronto!!

Also less personal thanks to Wilhelm, where ever you are, for your lovely scream, to Project Gugenhiem for their recording of Handel's Hallelujah Chorus, and to Iwan Gabovitch for use of his explosion sound effect.
